body: Making another AMA to add to the rest. Ask me anything!

replies.body:
How did you find Avicus?
When did you first join the server?
Is Frostedcupcakez a gul?
replies.body_tagged:
How did you find Avicus?
When did you first join the server?
Is Frostedcupcakez a gul?

replies.body:
How did I find Avicus? - I used to own a server that had to shut down due to money issues and I was pretty miserable. My friend, modfreak101, invited me to a server called "MCZone" When I first played it, I absolutely loved The Survival Games. After a while Avicus came out, and I was pretty sad that there wasn't a Survival Games anymore. After a month or so I tried out Nebula and absolutely loved it. Since then I played Avicus a lot more and made a lot of new friends.

When did you first join the server? - I don't remember an exact date, but I join MCZone about a month before Avicus.

Is FrostedCupcakez a gul? - Yee
replies.body_tagged:
